sentences.sentence: One of the dullest boys at a village school, more than thirty years ago, went up to repeat his lesson one morning; and, as usual, did not know it.
sentences.translation: 三十多年前，在一所乡村学校里，有一个十分愚笨的男孩，一天早上他上去复习他的功课；和往常一样，他都不懂。

sentences.sentence: Unfortunately,the show was one of teh dullest we have ever seen.
sentences.translation: 不幸的是，这次演出是我们看过的最乏味的演出了。

sentences.sentence: Madeleine had become an English major for the purest and dullest of reasons: because she loved to read.
sentences.translation: 当初玛德琳之所以选择英文专业，主要是出于最纯洁也是最无趣的原因：因为她喜欢读书。
